about_the_game:
They took your kids. Take their lives.

Bunni Gunni Classic is the story of revenge as you fight your way floor by floor trying to find your kids.

Explore the dungeon!

Bunni Gunni Classic is a dungeon crawler, fight through floors of procedural generated rooms, slaughtering all in sight.

Features

  • Custom Color Pallets
  • Classic Mode
  • Campaign
  • Native Windows, Mac, and Linux support!
detailed_description:
They took your kids. Take their lives.

Bunni Gunni Classic is the story of revenge as you fight your way floor by floor trying to find your kids.

Explore the dungeon!

Bunni Gunni Classic is a dungeon crawler, fight through floors of procedural generated rooms, slaughtering all in sight.

Features

  • Custom Color Pallets
  • Classic Mode
  • Campaign
  • Native Windows, Mac, and Linux support!
legal_notice: Bunni Gunni Theme "The Bun With a Gun" is owned by kettako

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Arch
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 730
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Arch
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Graphics: GTX 1650
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Monterey 12.5.1
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Could go lower, just tested on this
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Monterey 12.5.1
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Bunni Gunni Classic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 730
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is just a guess, could prob go lower
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is just a guess, def could be lower

short_description: They took your kids... Take their lives! Bunni Gunni Classic is a much needed polishing for the game jam game made in 4 days!
